articles.description: Fox News Mistress of Colorado man who killed kids, pregnant wife shopped for wedding dresses days before deaths: report Fox News The Colorado woman who was dating Chris Watts when he killed his pregnant wife and two young children reportedly made a number of …
articles.content: The Colorado woman who was dating Chris Watts when he killed his pregnant wife and two young children reportedly made a number of online searches seemingly related to the couple’s possible future together, including for wedding dresses. Nichol Kessinger, who … [+2137 chars]
